column1: Number of Schools, Teachers, and Pupils in Vocational High Schols Under The Ministry of Education and Culture by Province 2011/2012 - 2015/2016
Note: 1 Data of 2011/2012-2013/2014 were included in Kalimantan Province
Note: 2 The teachers who tought in two schools or more counted in every school
Source: Ministry of Educations and Culture
Data were quoted from Statistical Yearbook of Indonesia
